product.name: (10’’ UHD Monitor) 2-Way Audio 2-Antennas Enchance WiFi Wireless 5MP PIR Outdoor Camera Wireless Home Security Cameras System with Monitor Indoor Video Surveillance DVR Set
product.description:
Provides you about 130° wide viewing angle and reduces dead ends of surveillance areas.
You can remotely live view or chat by high-quality two-way audio via APP.
PIR & Smart AI Two way Detected avoid 99% False Alarm by leaves, cloud, animals or insects.
OOSSXX will send notifications and trigger alerts in real time once abnormal actions.
Receive accurate alerts and eliminate unnecessary notifications.
The 10’’ Inch Large Screen NVR provides you with Ultra Clear Video at the level of a Laptop Screen.
This wifi security camera outdoor wireless supports add up to 10 cameras up to 5MP resolution.
With an internet connection, you can watch the videos remotely from anywhere on your phone (IOS&Android), PCs, or tablet.
Regardless of the weather, it will operate continuously 24/7.Suitable for both indoor and outdoor.
Our security camera with monitor pairs easily for monitoring, even without an Internet connection.
You can play back videos anytime by date, time, or captured events and quickly locate the exact footage.
You can view and control the security camera system with monitor remotely via the App on your iOS/Android smart devices, and keep an eye on what matters.
All-in-One 10’’ Monitor
All-in-One 16’’ Monitor
All-in-One 10'' PoE NVR
All-in-One 10'' PoE NVR
All-in-one Monitor HD DVR
product.bullet_points:
• {All-in-One 10’’ UHD Monitor} This wifi security camera outdoor wireless supports add up to 10 cameras up to 5MP resolution. And the wireless outdoor cameras for home security comes with a 64G SD Card(up to 6TB/256GB). The 10’’ Inch Large Screen NVR provides you with Ultra Clear Video at the level of a Laptop Screen.
• {2-Way Audio} You can keep in touch with your family when you miss them and want to talk to them anywhere and anytime. This security camera supports multiple users(up to 4) to view streaming video simultaneously. You can remotely live view or chat by high-quality two-way audio via APP. Just download the free Eseecloud APP from APP Store (IOS) or Playstore (Android) on smart-phone.
• {2-Antennas to Enhance WiFi} The wireless signal is very important for this system. If the wireless signal is weak, the video will be blurred/stalled/disappeared, so we will update all cameras to real dual antennas. The wireless distance will be updated by about 55%, and the video will be even better. Smooth and clear.
• {130° Ultra Wide-Angle Lens Equipped} Optical wide-angle lens with multi-layer lens, provides you about 130° wide viewing angle and reduces dead ends of surveillance areas.
• {PIR & Smart AI Two-Way Detected} With the help of advanced recognition algorithms and Infrared Detectors, OOSSXX will send notifications in real time once abnormal actions.Compared with the Motion detection, Two way Detected avoid 99% False Alarm by leaves, cloud, animals or insects.
• {3K 5.0MP High Definition} The 5.0 Mega Pixel (2592 x 1944) High Definition security camera ensures the more safety of people and homes for 24/7 hours. Everything within 80 feet can be seen even at night. It is equipped with an IR-LED system, automatically activates the infrared mode in low lighting conditions.
• {Free APP No Month Fee} Download the free app "Honestview" from App Store on your smartphone. With an internet connection, you can watch the videos remotely from anywhere on your phone (IOS&Android), PCs, or tablet
features: {All-in-One 10’’ UHD Monitor} This wifi security camera outdoor wireless supports add up to 10 cameras up to 5MP resolution. And the wireless outdoor cameras for home security comes with a 64G SD Card(up to 6TB/256GB). The 10’’ Inch Large Screen NVR provides you with Ultra Clear Video at the level of a Laptop Screen.

{2-Way Audio} You can keep in touch with your family when you miss them and want to talk to them anywhere and anytime. This security camera supports multiple users(up to 4) to view streaming video simultaneously. You can remotely live view or chat by high-quality two-way audio via APP. Just download the free Eseecloud APP from APP Store (IOS) or Playstore (Android) on smart-phone.

{2-Antennas to Enhance WiFi} The wireless signal is very important for this system. If the wireless signal is weak, the video will be blurred/stalled/disappeared, so we will update all cameras to real dual antennas. The wireless distance will be updated by about 55%, and the video will be even better. Smooth and clear.
{130° Ultra Wide-Angle Lens Equipped} Optical wide-angle lens with multi-layer lens, provides you about 130° wide viewing angle and reduces dead ends of surveillance areas.

Everything within 80 feet can be seen even at night. It is equipped with an IR-LED system, automatically activates the infrared mode in low lighting conditions.
